nodes.label: Content
nodes.description: Primary node representing records from PostgreSQL table

constraints.cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT content_id_unique IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:Content) REQUIRE n.id IS UNIQUE
CREATE CONSTRAINT content_raw_html_id_unique IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:Content) REQUIRE n.raw_html_id IS UNIQUE
CREATE CONSTRAINT content_run_id_unique IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:Content) REQUIRE n.run_id IS UNIQUE

indexes.cypher: CREATE INDEX content_site_name_text IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:Content) ON (n.site_name)
CREATE INDEX content_title_text IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:Content) ON (n.title)
CREATE INDEX content_content_text IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:Content) ON (n.content)
CREATE INDEX content_meta_description_text IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:Content) ON (n.meta_description)
